name: Dir pseudo-class
description: The **dir pseudo-class** will match elements by its directionality determined by the document language. Currently `ltr` and `rtl` are common values - while `ltr` stands for `left-to-right` and `rtl` for `right-to-left`.
example_description: While elements with `ltr` will have a red color, `rtl` elements will have a blue color.
